summary: Implemented completion_data field across all implementation agents and skills. Added Stage 6a to agents for generating completion_summary and claudemd_suggestions. Updated skill postflight to propagate these fields to state.json. Simplified claudemd_suggestions schema from object to string.

artifacts.summary: Extended schema with completion_data field specification
Added Stage 6a for completion_data generation with meta task handling
Simplified claudemd_suggestions from object to string schema
Implementation summary with all modified files

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented completion_data generation in all implementation agents (general, lean, latex) with Stage 6a, and updated skill postflight (implementer, lean-implementation, latex-implementation) to propagate completion_summary and claudemd_suggestions fields to state.json. Simplified claudemd_suggestions from complex object to simple string.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Updated return-metadata-file.md schema with completion_data field, modified 3 agent definitions (general-implementation-agent.md, lean-implementation-agent.md, latex-implementation-agent.md), updated 3 skill SKILL.md files (skill-implementer, skill-lean-implementation, skill-latex-implementation), and simplified claudemd_suggestions schema in state-management.md from object to string type

next_steps: Run /todo to archive task and apply CLAUDE.md suggestions if warranted
